content.en: Collective communication optimization: Researchers have been investigating various aspects of collective communication operations in computer systems. They have been exploring questions such as how to optimize these operations for wide area systems, how to improve their performance in MPICH, and how to achieve adaptive collective communications in heterogeneous hierarchical computing systems. The agency attributed to algorithms in these studies is the design, development, and implementation of optimized algorithms and libraries for collective communication operations.
content.da: Kollektiv kommunikationsoptimering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige aspekter af kollektive kommunikationsoperationer i computersystemer. De har udforsket spørgsmål som, hvordan man optimerer disse operationer for systemer over store afstande, hvordan man forbedrer deres ydeevne i MPICH, og hvordan man opnår adaptive kollektive kommunikationer i heterogene hierarkiske computersystemer. Den agens, der tillægges algoritmerne i disse studier, er design, udvikling og implementering af optimerede algoritmer og biblioteker til kollektive kommunikationsoperationer.
